name: Pay the Price
description:
Pay the Price is a very short, simple action platformer game, where you play as a character on a budget, in a world where every action has a cost. Want to shoot something? Your gonna pay. Want to go invisible? Your gonna pay. Heck, wanna JUMP? Your gonna pay!

Beat each level by reaching the exit without running out of money while doing so. But the path is not easy. Work your way past obstacles, pestering spikes, bullets and more. Can you beat the game, and not go broke?

This game was made for the 36th GMC Game Jam, where the theme was "Everything has a cost"
